content.rendered:
Directed by Sarah Polley

Written by Sarah Polley. Miriam Toews

Star Rooney Mara(Ona). Judith Ivey(Agata). Emily Mitchell(Miep). Kate Hallett(Autje). Liv McNeil(Neitje). Claire Foy(Salome). Sheila McCarthy(Greta). Jessie Buckley(Mariche). Michelle McLeod(Mejal). Kira Guloien(Anna). Shayla Brown(Helena). Frances McDormand(Scarface Janz). Vivien Endicott Douglas(Clara (as Vivien Endicott-Douglas)). Ben Whishaw(August Epp). August Winter(Melvin). Lochlan Ray Miller(Julius Loewen (as Lochlan Miller)). Nathaniel McParland(Aaron). Will Bowes(Census Driver). Eli Ham(Klaus Loewen). Emily Drake(Dark Haired Woman). Marcus Craig(Cornelius). Caroline Gillis(Woman on the Path)

Language English

Producers Emily Jade Foley. Dede Gardner. Jeremy Kleiner. Lyn Lucibello. Frances McDormand. Brad Pitt

Production Hear/Say Productions. Plan B Entertainment
